headline: AT&T (T) Explores Sale of Mexico Unit for Over US$2 Billion
summary: AT&T (T) recently saw a slight increase in its stock price, moving up 2.37% over the last week amid rumors of potential M&A activity and ongoing market developments. Reports of the company exploring the sale of its Mexico unit for over $2 billion coincided with a period in which major indexes, such as the Dow Jones and Nasdaq, saw steady gains. Additionally, the positive response to AT&T's class-action settlement and new product launches mirrored the broader market recovery following previous...

headline: Miller Value Deep Value Strategy’s Views on Tutor Perini Corporation (TPC)
summary: Miller Value Partners, an investment management company, released its “Deep Value Strategy” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. The first half of the year mirrored 2020, with tariff and Covid fears driving the VIX Index over 50 and the U.S. Economic Policy Uncertainty Index reaching an all-time high. […]

headline: Tutor Perini fends off tariff impacts as backlog doubles
summary: The Los Angeles-based firm posted record backlog and its highest revenue since 2009 for the second quarter as its strategy to take on megaprojects produced results.

headline: Telecomm ETFs in Focus After VZ & T's Q2 Earnings Beat
summary: VZ and T beat earnings estimates. Also, powered by AI optimism and rate-cut hopes, the sector is poised for a rally. One can try ETFs like XTL and IYZ.
